meanings.definition: The process of making a design on a metal plate, glass, or other surface by using acid to cut into the surface.
meanings.sent1: The eching on the metal plate was intricate and detailed.
meanings.sent2: She admired the beautiful eching on the glass vase.
meanings.sent3: The eching on the surface seemed to tell a story of its own.
meanings.sent4: The eching on the metal plate was like a secret code waiting to be deciphered.
meanings.sent5: The eching on the glass was so delicate, it looked like lace.

meanings.definition: A design or image produced by etching.
meanings.sent1: The eching on the paper was a stunning work of art.
meanings.sent2: He framed the eching and hung it on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The eching on the canvas seemed to come alive in the light.
meanings.sent4: Her eching was as clear as a photograph.
meanings.sent5: The eching captured the beauty of nature perfectly.

meanings.definition: To engrave or carve a design into a surface using acid or a similar method.
meanings.sent1: She carefully eched her initials into the metal.
meanings.sent2: The artist eched a stunning portrait on the glass.
meanings.sent3: He eched a smiley face on the mirror just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The memory was eched into his mind forever.
meanings.sent5: The words were eched into the stone for all to see.
